import { useState } from "react" import ItemList from "./Posts.jsx" export const Post = () =>{ const [List, setList] = useState(ItemList) return ( <>
All Post
{List.map((curElem) =>{ return(
{curElem.admin} {curElem.date}. {curElem.time}

{curElem.title}

{curElem.description}

{curElem.views} Veiws

{curElem.comments} Comments

{curElem.hearts} ♥

) })}
) }
